str.value: You can retire your rogue by typing "%s" in the text field and pressing
str.local: 若你想将你的游侠退役，可以在文本输入框内输入 "%s" 然后按下

str.value: the "%s" button. Note, however, that doing so will kill your current
str.local: "%s" 按钮。注意：这样做将杀死你当前的

str.value: rogue and there is no undo button available.
You can delete your account by typing "%s" in the text field and
str.local: 若你想删除你的账号，可以在文本输入框内输入 "%s" 然后

str.value: pressing the "%s" button. Note, however, that doing so will delete
str.local: 按下 "%s" 按钮。注意：这样做将删除

str.value: all data and it can only be recovered by the admin while the logs exist.
str.local: 所有的数据，管理员只有在记录还在的情况下才可能恢复。

str.value: You can add an optional key bind on each action by
str.local: 你可以为每个动作绑定一个额外的按键，

str.value: focusing one of the buttons and pressing any other
str.local: 只需聚焦到特定按钮，然后按下
除了 %s，%s，%s 以及 %s 之外的键。

str.value: A key bind can be removed by clicking the button.
str.local: 点一下按钮可以清除与之绑定的按键。

str.value: Injecting blood into daemons, please wait...
str.local: 正在给恶魔注入鲜血，请稍候……

str.value: This key shows the items on the ground while it is pressed.
str.local: 这个按键按下时显示地上的物品。

str.value: This key is used with the movement keys to carry out actions such as pick lock, disarm trap and open door.
str.local: 这个键和移动键一起按可进行开锁、解除陷阱、开 门等动作。

str.value: This key is used with a hotkey to self cast spells, equip weapons in the offhand and to equip a ring on the offhand finger.
str.local: 这个键和热键一起按可对自己施法，在副手上装备 武器，以及在副手手指上装备戒指。

str.value: This key is used to accept interface choices and to climb stairs up and down.
str.local: 这个键用来在界面上确认，上下楼梯。

str.value: Hotkeys can be used to quickly cast spells and use talents.
str.local: 热键用来快速施法、使用天赋。

str.value: You can bind a hotkey by pressing it while having the desired spell or talent selected in the spellbook window.
str.local: 你可以在法术书窗口里选中喜欢的法术或天赋，同 时按下热键进行绑定。

str.value: This key shows the text field that can be used to send instant messages to other players (online only).
str.local: 这个键用来弹出一个文本输入框，用来向其他玩家 发送即时消息（仅用于在线模式）。

str.value: This key can be used to jump in one of the four main directions (north, south, east, west).
str.local: 这个键用来向四个主方向（东南西北）跳跃。

str.value: This key quickly swaps between the primary weapon set and the secondary weapon set.
str.local: 这个键用来在主武器组和备选武器组之间快速切换 。

str.value: This key brings up the inventory window with an option to equip and unequip items.
str.local: 这个键用来弹出物品界面，并进行装备和接触装备 。
这个键会整理背包内的物品。

str.value: This key is used to quickly travel back to town after the current level has been cleared.
str.local: 这个键用来在当前楼层探查完毕后快速返城。

str.value: This key brings up the attack cursor that can be used to attack enemies with ranged weapons.
str.local: 这个键带出攻击光标，用远程武器攻击敌人。

str.value: This key is used to search the surroundings for traps and hidden features.
str.local: 这个键用来搜索周围的陷阱及隐藏物。

str.value: This key shows the inventory window with an option to drop items.
str.local: 这个键弹出物品界面，并开始丢弃物品。

str.value: This key shows the inventory window with an option to throw items.
str.local: 这个键弹出物品界面，并开始投掷物品。

str.value: This key brings up the focus cursor that can be used to order allies to focus on the chosen target.
str.local: 这个键带出聚焦光标，用来指挥盟友聚焦到选择的 目标上。

str.value: This key shows the spellbook that can be used to use talents and cast known spells.
str.local: 这个键弹出法术书界面，使用其中的天赋或法术。

str.value: This key brings up the look cursor that can be used to take a closer look at a target within range.
str.local: 这个键弹出观察光标，用来观察范围内的物体。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor up.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向上移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor down.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向下移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor right.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向右移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor left.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向左移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor up and right.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向右上移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor down and right.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向右下移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor up and left.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向左上移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor down and left.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向左下移动。

str.value: This key is used to rest for one turn.
str.local: 这个键用来休息一个回合。

str.value: Note that Keypad 5 requires that Num Lock is on and the 5 is a dead key otherwise (game engine feature).
str.local: 注意：小键盘 5 必须在小键盘灯亮起时才有效，否 则无效（游戏引擎限制）。

str.id: Hover mouse over the checkboxes to find out how to unlock them.
str.value: Hover mouse over the checkboxes to find out how to unlock them.
str.local: 把鼠标停留在勾选框上看看如何解锁它们。

str.id: Sets the account name when the program is launched.
str.value: Sets the account name when the program is launched.
str.local: 在程序启动后设置一个账号名称。

str.id: Enables the use of a Playstation 4 gamepad.
str.value: Enables the use of a Playstation 4 gamepad.
str.local: 开启 Playstation 4 手柄支持。

str.value: You have entered the Market Quarter and here you can trade items with various merchants.
str.local: 你进入了商业集市，这里可以和各式 商人交易物品。

str.value: Note that once the merchants' inventories are filled with junk, you can reset them by resting in the inn.
str.local: 注意：如果商人的货架被垃圾堆满的 话，你可以通过在旅店休息重置它们 。

str.value: You have entered Leo's Workshop and here you can have items crafted in exchange for materials and a few gold coins.
str.local: 你进入了鲁班的工坊，在这里你可以 交纳一些材料和一点金币打造你要的 物品。

str.value: If you have crafting materials, schematics or gold, you can store them here to free up some inventory space.
str.local: 如果你有制造材料，图纸或金币，你 可以免费存放在这里。

str.value: Note that only stored materials can be used for crafting (drop an item to store it).
str.local: 注意：仓储材料只可被用于制造（将 物品拖进来可以存放它）。

str.value: You have entered the Artisans' Guild and here you can have your items repaired.
str.local: 你进入了工匠行会，在这里你可以修 理你的物品。

str.value: If you have unique items, you can donate them to the guild with a drag and drop.
str.local: 如果你获得了独特物品，可以通过拖 拽进行会捐献它们。

str.value: If you have unidentified charms, you can identify them for free by attempting to donate them to the guild.
str.local: 如果你有未鉴定的护符，你可以尝试 将它们捐献给行会来获得免费鉴定。

str.value: Note that if you ever need to return some quest item then this is the place to do so.
str.local: 注意：如果你需要返还一些任务物品 ，这里就是做这事的地方。

str.value: You have entered the Diviners' Guild and here you can have your items identified.
str.local: 你进入了占卜师行会，在这里你可以 鉴定你的物品。

str.value: You have entered the Wizards' Guild and here you can have your items enchanted.
str.local: 你进入了法师行会，在这里你可以对 你的物品附魔。

str.value: Items can usually have one enchant on them and blessed items can have two enchants.
str.local: 物品通常可以附魔一次，但神圣的物 品可以附魔两次。

str.value: When you enchant an item you are given an option to choose from three possible outcomes.
str.local: 每当你对物品附魔时，你可以在三个 效果中选择一个。

str.value: You can also cancel the selection in which case nothing changes, but you will not get your gold back.
str.local: 你可以取消选择而中止附魔，但是没 有退款。

str.value: Note that some items, such as thrown weapons, do not give you a choice because they have their own rules for enchanting.
str.local: 注意：一些物品，比如投掷类武器， 没有选择因为它们有自己的附魔规则 。

str.value: You have entered the Shrine of Nibar and here you can remove curses and magical effects for a minor donation.
str.local: 你进入了力霸神殿，在这里你可以移 除诅咒或魔法效果，但需要一点香火 钱。

str.value: You have entered the Shrine of Fubar and here you can remove poison and disease effects for a minor donation.
str.local: 你进入了福霸神殿，在这里你可以移 除毒害或疾病效果，但需要一点香火 钱。

str.value: You have entered the Frostmourn Inn where you can feast and rest while time passes by.
str.local: 你进入了霜之哀伤旅店，在这里你可以饱餐 休息让时光流逝。

str.value: If you choose to stay in the inn you will be fully healed and your hunger and thirst will be satiated.
str.local: 如果你选择住进旅店，你的生命将完全恢复 ，饱腹度和饥渴度都将回到满足状态。

str.value: Another thing that happens is that the merchants in the Market Quarter will have their stocks reset.
str.local: 另一件事情将会发生，商业集市里的商人会 重置他的货物。

str.value: Finally, you will hear about a new dungeon nearby, which allows you to reset your current dungeon.
str.local: 最后，你将打听到附近一座新的地牢，这意 味着你当前的地牢将重置。

str.value: Note that this also increases your chance of finding a random encounter when you do clear a dungeon.
str.local: 注意：这还会提升下一次你清空地牢后发生 一场随机遭遇战的机会。

str.value: Whether you have explored the current dungeon or spent some time feasting and resting, it matters not.
str.local: 你是否探索完当前的地牢，或是在旅 店休整了一段时间，这并不重要。

str.value: You are now ready to face new challenges just as soon as you want.
str.local: 如你所愿，现在你准备接受新的挑战 。

str.value: Be warned, however, that you should make sure you are fully prepared for anything that might show up...
str.local: 然而要提醒的是，你要确定是否做好 了面对一切的完全准备……

str.id: You can't donate when there's nothing wrong with you.

str.value: You choose to leave and the Wizards' Guild thanks you for your donation.

str.value: You feast and rest in the inn as time passes by.

str.id: You leave the town and enter the dungeon.
str.value: You leave the town and enter the dungeon.

str.id: You leave the dungeon and enter the town.
str.value: You leave the dungeon and enter the town.

str.id: Some of your friends may have gotten lost in the process.
str.value: Some of your friends may have gotten lost in the process.

str.id: You prepare yourself for the new challenge ahead...
str.value: You prepare yourself for the new challenge ahead...

str.id: You tell your friends to head out to the new dungeon...
str.value: You tell your friends to head out to the new dungeon...

str.id: Failed to load map [%s]. Perhaps you should contact the developer...
str.value: Failed to load map [%s]. Perhaps you should contact the developer...

str.id: %s is now properly buried at the shrine of the forgotten heroes and %s should not haunt us anymore.
str.value: %s is now properly buried at the shrine of the forgotten heroes and %s should not haunt us anymore.

str.id: I was born to do this!
str.value: I was born to do this!
Some travelers are staying in the inn and they claim to have seen %s in a dungeon nearby.
str.local: 待在旅店中的旅客声称在附近的地牢 中见过 %s 。

str.value: The travelers don't seem like much of a dungeon dwellers but they are certainly greedier than your average rogue.
str.local: 这些旅客看起来不太像地牢中的土著 ，但肯定比你们这些游侠更贪婪。

str.value: If you want to learn the location of the dungeon and %s, you will have to pay dearly for it.
str.local: If @(32)如果你想打听地牢的位置以及 %s ，你需要必须付点钱。

str.value: You pay the travelers and head out to face %s.
str.local: 你付了钱给旅客，出发去找 %s 。

str.value: The master artificer Leo Noerde has been taken hostage and the Artisan's Guild is looking for someone to rescue him.
str.local: 工匠大师鲁班被捉为人质，工匠行会 正在招募人选去解救他。

str.value: There seems to be no reward for whatever reason, but you never know what might happen if he is rescued.
str.local: 不知道为什么，这个任务看起来没有 报酬，但是你无法预知救了他会发生 什么。

str.value: Note that once you accept the quest you must finish it before leaving the dungeon or the quest will fail.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You accept the quest and head out to save the artificer.
str.local: 你接受了任务，出发拯救工匠。

str.value: Apparently a chronomancer, whatever that is, went to study some ancient sewer and hasn't been seen in a while.
str.local: 很明显，有个时空术士，别管他是谁 ，前往调研古代下水道，有一段时间 没再看见他了。

str.value: Leo Noerde wants you to find out what happened to him and return back any unique items he may have found.
str.local: 鲁班想让你去看看他怎样了，把他找 到的独特物品带回来。

str.value: Note that once you accept the quest you must finish it before leaving the dungeon or the quest will fail.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You accept the quest and head out to find any unique items.
str.local: 你接受了任务，出发寻找独特物品。

str.value: Some cultists have come up with a plan to take over the world by waking up an old monster that should've stayed dead.
str.local: 一些邪教徒开启了一个计划，想唤醒 一个本已死去的老怪物来征服世界。

str.value: Obviously that is bad but what is even worse is that those cultists are carrying a lot of gold that should be yours.
str.local: 这当然很糟糕，但还有更糟的事情是 哪些邪教徒带走了本该属于你的大量 金币。

str.value: Note that once you accept the quest you must finish it before leaving the dungeon or the quest will fail.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You accept the quest and head out to face the cultists in their lair.
str.local: 你接受了任务，出发前往邪教徒的巢穴。

str.value: Bad guys are drawn here like moths to the flames and the latest one goes by the title of Dreadlord.
str.local: 坏人就像飞蛾扑火般涌现在这里，最 后一个出现的是黑暗之主。

str.value: You probably should be on your way by now, because if you don't go and snatch the loot, someone else will!
str.local: 或许你要上路了，因为如果你不去抢 夺战利品，就会有人捷足先登！

str.value: Note that once you accept the quest you must finish it before leaving the dungeon or the quest will fail.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You accept the quest and head out to face the Dreadlord in his castle.
str.local: 你接受了任务，出发去黑暗之主的城堡面对挑战。

str.value: You are now deemed strong enough to challenge %s for the throne.
str.local: 你现在已经强大到可以去挑战 %s 夺 取王位。

str.value: Should you wish to issue the challenge, you can do so now.
str.local: 你想面对挑战吗，现在就可以去了。

str.value: Note that once you do so there is no way to come back and failure in this quest means death.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You issue a challenge to %s and enter the Frostmourn Keep.
str.local: 你接受了针对 %s 的挑战，进入了霜之哀伤城楼。

str.value: You can't afford to pay the required fee.
You have found the quest item. You should probably head back and turn it in.
str.local: 你找到了任务物品。现在应该回去归还它。

str.id: %s yells: Very well coward, have it your way!
str.value: %s yells: Very well coward, have it your way!

str.id: Orc boss yells: Wraaagh kek Hulk!
str.value: Orc boss yells: Wraaagh kek Hulk!

str.id: Wizard yells: Who dares to insult the Sacred Order of the Pink?!?
str.value: Wizard yells: Who dares to insult the Sacred Order of the Pink?!?

str.value: Prince Altren yells: Find %s and bring me %s head!

str.value: Master Gifin-Gif yells: Find %s and bring me %s head!

str.value: Beartamer Gareth yells: There's something for you to chew here!

str.value: Ice Queen Altara yells: Come and face your doom!

str.value: Prince Altren yells: What?!? This can't be! Noooo...

str.id: Prince Altren yells: Hahaha! You have finally set me free!
str.value: Prince Altren yells: Hahaha! You have finally set me free!

str.id: Leo Noerde yells: My work did not reach the quality it should have!

Ranged attack that causes D3 extra damage instead of 1 for each point of agility bonus modifier.
str.local: 远程攻击每点敏捷增益修正获得 D 3 的额外伤害，取代普通的 1 点额 外伤害。

str.value: Ranged attack that hits up to agility bonus modifier number of extra targets.
str.local: 远程攻击将命中目标生物邻接的多 个额外生物目标，数量等于敏捷增 益修正值。

str.value: Ranged attack that allows the creature to move before taking the shot.
str.local: 远程攻击的射击前生物可以先移动 。

str.value: Ranged attack that allows the creature to re-roll a failed to-hit check and doubles damage if used while hidden.
str.local: 远程攻击时，可以重投失败的命中 检定，在隐秘状态下能造成双倍伤 害。

str.value: Melee attack that gains up to one extra attack per weapon (at +1 and +3 AGI). Blade Flurry requires either two small
str.local: 近战攻击的每把武器（当敏捷 +1 及 +3 时）获得最一次额外攻击机 会。剑刃乱舞需要两把小型武器或 双手使用一把中型武器。

str.value: weapons or a medium weapon that is used two-handedly.
Thrown weapon attack that causes D3 extra damage instead of 1 for each point of strength or agility bonus modifier,
str.local: 投掷武器攻击的每点属性增益修正 获得 D3 额外伤害，取代普通的 1 点额外伤害，依据的属性取力量和 敏捷中的较高值。（修正同时针对 命中检定）。

str.value: whichever is higher (modifier also applies to to-hit checks).
Allows the creature to move up to two spaces and attack a target at the end of the move.
str.local: 允许生物最多移动两格，然后在移 动停止后攻击目标。

str.value: Also adds +1 damage modifier for the attack.
str.local: 英勇冲锋还会增加 1 点伤害修正。

str.value: Melee attack that causes D3 extra damage instead of 1 for each point of strength bonus modifier.
str.local: 近战攻击的每点力量增益修正都获 得 D3 额外伤害，取代普通的 1 点 额外伤害。

str.value: Requires a medium or large weapon.
str.local: 粉碎打击需要一把中型或大型武器 。

str.value: Melee attack that can instantly kill the target creature on hit (if the attack hits and the to-hit roll is a pair).
str.local: 近战攻击在攻击命中且命中骰投出 一对时，立即杀死对方。

str.value: Requires a medium or large weapon.
str.local: 致命一击需要一把中型或大型武器 。

str.value: Melee attack that hits the target creature and up to +STR adjacent targets. Requires a medium or large weapon and
str.local: 主手近战武器将命中和攻击者邻接 的多个额外生物目标，其数量取决 于力量增益修正。横扫打击需要一 把中型或大型武器。当装备大型武 器时，还会获得 +1 最小格档修正 以及 +1 最大招架修正。

str.value: grants +1 min block and +1 max parry modifier with large weapons.
Shield attack that can knock back and stun the target for D3 turns. This attack cannot be blocked, dodged, or
str.local: 用盾牌攻击可将目标击退并眩晕目 标 D3 回合。盾击不会被格档、闪 避或招架。盾牌还会将偏斜修正设 为和格档修正相同。

str.value: parried and causes the creature's deflect modifier to equal block modifier.
Move action that hides the creature in plain sight. Melee attacks made while hidden cause double damage and
str.local: 移动行动让生物在视野中隐秘。在 隐秘状态下发动近战攻击将造成双 倍伤害，且无法格档、闪避和招架 。

str.value: cannot be blocked, dodged or parried.
Allows the creature to read and write Common, cast spells scribed on scrolls and zap with wands.
str.local: 允许生物常规读写，释放记录在魔 法卷轴上的法术，释放魔杖的能力 。

str.value: Allows the creature to learn Celestial spells from magical tomes. Celestial spells always use Max Cast Modifier of 2
str.local: 允许生物从魔法书中学习天使系法 术。天使系法术的最大施法修正无 视所穿盔甲，永远为 2 或更高。

str.value: Allows the creature to learn Draconic spells from magical tomes.
str.local: 允许生物从魔法书中学习龙系法术 。

str.value: Allows the creature to learn Infernal spells from magical tomes.
str.local: 允许生物从魔法书中学习地狱系法 术。

str.value: Allows the creature to cast spells at any space within line of sight. Direct damage and healing spells receive extra
str.local: 允许生物定位任何在视野直线可达 区的目标并释放法术。另外，直接 伤害或治疗法术都会因对应的属性 增益修正获得额外的效果。

str.value: damage or healing depending on the relevant bonus modifier.
Allows the creature to cast spells while silenced and halves spell to-hit range modifier rounding down.
str.local: 允许生物在沉默状态释放法术，且 将施法的距离修正减半向下取整。
沉默施法还会教会沉静施法。

str.value: Increases light radius by 1 and halves ranged attack to-hit range modifier rounding down.
str.local: 增加一格视野，并将距离修正减半 向下取整。

str.value: Offhand attacks no longer receive penalties to hit and damage and parry modifier equals to agility bonus modifier
str.local: 副手攻击不再承受的命中修正的惩 罚，伤害和招架修正取敏捷修正而 不是其一半。

str.value: instead of one half of it.

str.local: 增加一格搜索半径，并在移动或休 息行动时免费获得一次搜索周围的 行动。锐利目光还会在失败的搜索 检定后重掷。

str.value: searches the surroundings when taking a move or rest action.

str.local: 允许生物重掷反射检定，并在拾起 装备或使用未鉴定的被诅咒物品前 给出警告。

str.value: Allows the creature to re-roll failed mental checks and halves the duration of charm, envy, fear, frenzy, greed, lust
str.local: 允许生物重掷失败的精神检定，并 将媚惑、忌妒、恐惧、狂暴、贪婪 、欲望、鲁莽效果的持续时间减半 ，向下取整。

str.value: Allows the creature to see hidden bear traps and step on them without triggering the effects and allows the
str.local: 允许生物看见隐藏的捕熊夹，站在 其上不会触发效果。陷阱大师还能 拆解可见的捕熊夹留到以后使用。

str.local: 将生物变为一只狼，把天赋替换为 英勇冲锋，潜行，第六感，敏锐目 光（根据等级开放）。

str.local: 尝试移除目标生物身上的一个疫病 效果。

str.value: Attempts to remove one poison effect from the target creature.
str.local: 尝试移除目标生物身上的一个中毒 效果。

str.value: Attempts to remove one magical effect from the target creature, location or an item in the caster's inventory.
str.local: 尝试移除目标生物身上，或特定地 点，施法者物品栏中的物品上的一 个魔法效果。

str.value: Increases agility and charisma and physical, poison and disease resistances.
str.local: 增加敏捷和魅力属性，增强物理抗 性、毒害抗性和疾病抗性。

str.value: Increases strength and stamina and fire, frost and shock resistances.
str.local: 增加力量和耐力属性，增强火焰抗 性、冰霜抗性和震击抗性。

str.value: Allows you to cast spells at any target within line of sight or halves the spell to-hit range modifier.
str.local: 允许你对视线内的任何目标施放法 术，或是将施法命中距离修正减半 。

str.value: Heals the target creature and attempts to restore one point of ability damage.
str.local: 治疗目标生物并尝试回复一点属性 伤害。

str.value: Heals the target creature and all adjacent creatures.
str.local: 治疗目标生物及所有和该目标邻接 的生物。

str.value: Places a heal over time effect on the target creature.
str.local: 赋予目标生物一个治疗的持续效果 。

str.value: Causes magic damage or instantly kills the target undead creature.
str.local: 立刻杀死目标不死生物，或对其造 成魔法伤害。

str.value: Places a magical effect on you that amplifies the damage of orb spells.
str.local: 赋予你一个持续效果，它可以增强 法术球的伤害。

str.value: Causes shock damage to the target creature and has a chance of paralysing the target.
str.local: 对目标生物造成震击伤害，有一定 机会使目标麻痹。

str.value: Places a magical effect on you that enlarges the next orb spell cast while the effect lasts.
str.local: 赋予你一个持续效果，在效果结束 前可以让下一个法术球变大。

str.value: Causes fire damage to the target creature and has a chance of setting the target on fire.
str.local: 对目标生物造成火焰伤害，有一定 机会使目标燃烧。

str.value: Causes frost damage to the target creature and has a chance of slowing the target.
str.local: 对目标生物造成冰霜伤害，有一定 机会使目标迟缓。

str.value: Places a magical effect on all creatures within line of sight that increases light and search radius.
str.local: 对视线内所有生物附加一个魔法效 果，增加他们的亮度和搜索范围。

str.value: Places a magical effect on you that increases all resistances (the effect is removed if your equipment changes).
str.local: 给你附加一个魔法效果，增强所有 的抗性（这个效果会在变更装备时 移除）。

str.value: Creates a duplicate of the caster that can distract enemies.
str.local: 复制一个施法者，可使敌人分心。

str.value: Attempts to remove one curse effect from the target creature, location or an item in the caster's inventory.
str.local: 尝试移除目标生物身上，或特定地 点，施法者物品栏中的物品上的一 个诅咒效果。

str.value: Allows the caster to magically use remote objects such as doors, chests, levers and so on.
str.local: 允许施法者使用魔法来操纵远程物 体，像门、宝箱、开关等这类东西 。

str.value: Causes magic damage or instantly kills the target daemon.
str.local: 立刻杀死目标恶魔，或对其造成魔 法伤害。

str.value: Attempts to place a random curse effect on the target creature or Curse of Agony if the check fails.
str.local: 尝试给目标生物施加一个随机的诅 咒效果，或在检定失败时施加痛苦 诅咒。

str.value: Places a magical effect on the target creature that turns its soul to a soul gem upon death.
str.local: 给目标生物附加一个魔法效果，若 目标生物死亡，该生物的灵魂将被 捕获进一颗晶石中。

str.value: Places a magical effect on you that forces attackers to take a fear check.
str.local: 给你施加一个魔法效果，任何试图 攻击你的生物都必须先通过一次恐 惧检定。

str.value: Attempts to temporarily charm a daemon and make it your friend.
str.local: 尝试临时魅惑一个恶魔，使其成为 你的伙伴。

str.value: Attempts to teleport the caster to another location within line of sight.
str.local: 将施法者立即传送到视野内的另一 个位置。

str.value: Releases a soul from a random soul gem on the target creature or an item in the caster's inventory.
str.local: 将魂晶中的灵魂释放到目标生物或 是施法者物品栏中的物品上。

str.value: Attempts to summon a daemon and then attempts to enslave it.
str.local: 尝试召唤一个恶魔并尝试奴役它。

str.value: Causes poison damage to the target creature and has a chance of applying a random poison effect.
str.local: 对目标生物造成毒伤害，有一定机 会附加一个随机的毒害效果。

str.value: Causes disease damage to the target creature and has a chance of applying a random disease effect.
str.local: 对目标生物造成疾病伤害，有一定 机会附加一个随机的疾病效果。

str.value: Creates a shield around the caster that absorbs damage until it breaks.
str.local: 在施法者周围创建出一层护盾，护 盾会吸收伤害直至破碎。

str.value: Summons a lesser daemon at the target location and enslaves it.
str.local: 在目标位置召唤一个小点的恶魔， 并奴役它。

str.value: Identifies the targeted item in the caster's inventory.
str.local: 鉴定施法者物品栏中的指定物品。

str.value: Enchants the targeted item in the caster's inventory with a random enchant.
str.local: 给施法者物品栏中指定物品进行一 次随机附魔。

str.value: Causes fire, frost and shock damage to the target and all adjacent creatures.
str.local: 对目标生物及它的邻接生物造成火 焰、冰霜和震击伤害。

str.value: Creates a clone of the target creature that aids the caster for awhile.
str.local: 给目标生物制造一个克隆体，它能 协助施法者一小段时间。

str.value: Permanently turns a dead human into an undead familiar.
str.local: 永久的将一个死去的人类转变为一 个亡灵朋友。

str.value: Transmutes the targeted item in the caster's inventory into gold coins.
str.local: 将施法者物品栏中的目标物品炼成 金币。

str.value: Causes magic damage or instantly kills the target creature.
str.local: 立刻杀死目标生物，或对其造成魔 法伤害。

str.value: Increases or decreases the height of terrain on even or odd turns respectively.
str.local: 在偶数回合抬高，在奇数回合降低 地块高度。

Spaulders increase your base chance to resist a critical hit disarm effect by 40%.
Vambraces force the system to re-roll the disarm check if you are disarmed by a critical hit.
Gloves cause your disarmed weapon to be placed in your inventory instead of the ground.
Boots force the system to attempt a sidestep if a knockback would push you into a chasm or trap.
Primarily used by people who have strangulation fantasies, but they do occasionally work for others too.
Teaches a spell that creates a shield around yourself.
Suffocates the wearer over time. This amulet cannot be unequipped.
Teaches a spell that conjures daemons out of thin air.
Teaches a spell that identifies magical properties of an item.
Teaches a spell that enchants an item with magical properties.
Teaches an orb spell that causes a moderate elemental explosion.
Exhausts the wearer over time. This amulet cannot be unequipped.
Grants a haste effect and immunity against slow effects.
Ethereal: Halves physical, poison and disease damage but doubles magical and elemental damage taken.
Teaches a spell that creates a clone of another creature.
Teaches a spell that turns dead humans into undead familiars.
Restores the wearer to full health and energy upon death... (sometimes)
Oh my G'awd... they killed Ken'nih. You bastards!
Reflects weapon and orb spell damage back at the attacker... (sometimes)
Allows the wearer to automatically pick locks and moving no longer breaks stealth.
Turns the wearer to stone over time. This amulet cannot be unequipped.
Teaches a spell that transmutes an item into gold coins.
Adorable piece of jewelry, contains no magical powers though.
Ignores negative effects to spellcasting while wearing armour and or shield.
Every point of damage you cause has a 17% chance to charm the target for 1 turn.
Teaches a spell that allows you to alter the terrain height from chasms to walls.
Gives you an aura with a radius of 1. Auras also make you immune to their effects.
This must be equipped in order to sacrifice something using a sacrificial circle and a ritual.
Every point of damage you receive has a 17% chance to charm you for 1 turn. This amulet cannot be unequipped.
Travel button now works after clearing 50% of the current level.
Teaches a spell that causes magic damage or instantly kills the target creature.
Adorable piece of jewelry that seems to contain some magical powers as well.
Grants one free action and immunity against slow effects.
Ethereal: Halves physical, poison and disease damage taken.
Ignores negative effects to spellcasting and dodging while wearing armour and or shield.
Every point of damage you cause has a 33% chance to charm the target for 1 turn.
Gives you an aura with a radius of 2. Auras also make you immune to their effects.
This must be in your possession in order to sacrifice something using a sacrificial circle and a ritual.
Travel button now works after clearing 25% of the current level.
Note that wearing an armour may hinder spellcasting, dodging, climbing and or jumping.
str.local: 注意：穿戴护甲有可能妨碍施法、 闪避、攀爬、跳跃。

str.value: Note that wearing a helmet may hinder spellcasting, dodging, climbing and or jumping.
str.local: 注意：穿戴头盔有可能妨碍施法、 闪避、攀爬、跳跃。

str.value: If the creatures weren't anosmic, they would die when you enter the level.
str.local: 你下到地牢时，所有有嗅觉的生物 都会被熏死。

str.value: This hood feels as if it were part of your head and detached at the same time.
str.local: 这块头巾摸上去感觉像是你脑袋的 一部分，又似乎不存在。

str.value: Even these simple sticks can hurt you if they are propelled by enough force.
The bowman's recipe of win: head, shaft and fletching propelled by enough force.
The sinister colour on these makes them more powerful than ordinary arrows.
The crossbowman's recipe of win: take a bolt and use more than enough force.
The sinister colour on these makes them more powerful than ordinary bolts.
All of the tears shed by knabs makes these arrows lighter than a feather.
The house always wins, the sooner you realise that the better.
This hare was privileged enough to limp away with the rest of its white limbs.
If this is just a fragment, you wonder how hot the real thing would be.
If this is just a fragment, you wonder how cold the real thing would be.
If this is just a fragment, you wonder how windy the real thing would be.
If this is just a fragment, you wonder how tough the real thing would be.
No monsters were hurt while making this eye. It happened during the removal.
This tear was collected just before a young girl lost her innocence to a horde of savage raiders.
The owner of this egg has to settle for one kingdom instead of seven.
This ticker just keeps on going. Perhaps it has some magic powers.
A gentleman bunny or hairy hands on the cover would've been too much, right?
So this is how you make items and game mechanics obsolete as time goes by.
This turns any bow into an assault bow. Remember to shout out the name of your deity before mowing infidels.
They say that Lyrion Bannister finally lost his mojo and the dwarves were no more. So sad.
If this was black, the moon worshiping sand people would dance around it.
Perhaps the 2020 written on the cap means that you win bigly.
Projects a terrible force when 'Kameha..', uhm, 'Ei' is spoken out loud.
It reads 'Tafsa inte' in demonic, which roughly means 'Don't touch me' in common.
Debt is wealth that you never have to pay back. You should start accumulating now...
Isn't it weird that a ghoul tooth coin is the most powerful item in the game?
Rubber will be invented in about a 1000 years. Until then, sinews and intestines will have to do.
Anyone else get a scary, scarab-y, -ey, uhh whatever, feeling about this?
Clip-clop, clip-clop, Uberlyft needs its missing shoe to make you pop.
The face of cultural appropriation panda when it got lei'd and someone said 'Aloha! Snackbar?'.
These things would work if all the keys would match only one lock but when all keys match every lock...
Think about a tight weapon chain. Either your hand is ripped off or the chain limits your reach.
Wow. An unconfortably large earring in a game where there is no earring slot to equip it. Awesome.
Oh well, this was one of those things that were never intended to be added but here we are.
This horn wasn't able to avoid a busload of fairies that were offended by its toxic masculinity.
This symbolizes the abyssal ways of clipping tips and tops of things that protrude too much.
All physical damage you deal to enemies also bleeds gold coins.
Doubles the effect of fire damage enchants on weapons.
Doubles the effect of frost damage enchants on weapons.
Doubles the effect of shock damage enchants on weapons.
Increases minimum and maximum block modifier by 1.
You appear to be twice as far than you actually are (at least when calculating range modifiers).
Increases max cast modifier of Celestial spells by 1.
Increases max cast modifier of Draconic spells by 1.
Increases max cast modifier of Infernal spells by 1.
Every turn spent resting with this book makes you forget a random knowledge.
All items are automatically identified when they are picked up.
Doubles the maximum stack size of bolts and arrows.
Use this demonic appendage with a blessed ring to permanently bind the ring's power on it.
Reduces the cooldown of Arcane spells by 50%.
Sadly, all this cap does is that it enrages demonrats when they see a person carrying one.
Increases physical damage by 50% against daemons.
Daemons must pass a mental check in order to attack you.
You can enchant items for free, at least until credits run out.
You can say 'Molar Varghulis' for dramatic effect when you throw this at your enemy.
Increases the maximum range of thrown rocks by 60% and converts their damage type to magical.
Shoots a bolt back at the attacker when you parry an attack.
Travel button works in town now and it takes you back to where you left.
Allows you to see health bars on all visible creatures.
When you pick a locked chest, a critical success adds blessed loot in the chest.
You can use this earring to make the game consider all turns as either even or odd.
Water chasms can now be used to catch fish.
Allows apprentice wizards to learn and cast Bestial spells while levitating (it's those fairies, duh).
Allows apprentice wizards to learn and cast Abyssal spells while standing in a sacrificial circle.
Any drake attempting to attack you becomes your friend permanently.
Summons a loot hoarder at the first level of every random dungeon.
There is a total of %d gold coins in your backpack and %d gold coins in the Artisans' Guild vault.
There is a total of %d gold coins in your backpack.
Some people have become sick after eating raw meat.
Fried meat is much safer to eat than raw meat.
Some people have become sick after eating raw ribs.
Fried ribs are much safer to eat than raw ribs.
Some people have become sick after eating raw fish.
Fried fish is much safer to eat than raw fish.
Some people have become sick after eating raw chicken.
Fried chicken is much safer to eat than raw chicken.
Blood caps are said to have bad blood in them.
Frying supposedly removes the bad blood from blood caps.
Tastes a bit dull but keeps the hunger away.
This wedge smells like a peasant girl's armpit.
Some people have become sick after eating a raw egg.
Fried egg is much safer to eat than a raw egg.
Boy, apple, arrow, miss, shovel, dig, forget.
What's up du... uhh, copyright infringement.
Imagine that all women look like pears. Blaaarrgghh.
If you are late you must ketchup. I'll get my coat.
This must be the synonym for gangrenous nut sack.
Stick it with a pin and somewhere someone dies.
If you weren't so sweet, we wouldn't be in this jam.
Popping these cherries do not lock you up.
Grapevines exist only because winevines sound silly.
These things are responsible for global warming.
'Tis a shame you can't cook these into salted chips.
There lives a small squirrel in every one of us.
Tastes great if you like to pretend that you are a goat.
Perhaps vampires will be added in the game at some point.
Even the worst axe murderer becomes a cry baby when you slice this.
Can be eaten but they can also clean porcelain toilets.
These are mild peppers that do not cause Bloody Flux.
A dungeon dweller's food ration is a poor man's feast.
Water flask makes well water taste like spring water.
Beer is the only reason why hunter gatherers became farmers.
Fermenting honey with water turns any man into a poet.
Too much fermented apple juice may give you a head ache.
Red or white, both are fine, tavern wench, bring me wine.
Wow, alchemists have come up with a drink that doesn't remove thirst.
Rogues that have not yet stopped breast feeding will love this.

Contains a mixture that smells and tastes bad enough to cure poisons and diseases.
Contains a lovely tonic that causes your pupils to dilate beyond normal range.

Contains a vitriolic and oily substance that burns your skin when touched.
Contains charming poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.

Grants a haste effect at the expense of doubling the food and water consumption rates.
Triples food consumption rate. This ring cannot be unequipped.
Grants immunity against poison, disease and curse effects.
May contain up to three different enchants instead of one.
Allows the wearer to re-roll failed energy regeneration checks and makes him vulnerable to fire.
Grants immunity against leech, drain and instant death effects.
Automatically identifies scrolls and tomes when they are picked up.
Grants a free search action and allows the wielder to re-roll failed search checks. This effect does not stack.
Ignores food and water consumption on either even or odd game turns (main hand or offhand).
Triples water consumption rate. This ring cannot be unequipped.
Makes you vulnerable to all damage. This ring cannot be unequipped.
Heals you for 20% of the physical weapon damage you cause.
Converts all weapon damage you receive into physical damage and reduces it by 10%.
Increases physical damage by 20% with melee and ranged weapons.
Halves experience gained. This effect does not stack.
Hides you in plain sight when you take damage.
Each point of energy counts as 3 points of health. This effect does not stack.
Increases all resistances by up to 5, the lower your health.
Another ring to rule them all. This one also makes you invisible and it is now your precious!
Increases either block, dodge or parry modifier by 2. This effect does not stack.
Summons and controls a drake when equipped. This ring is destroyed if the drake dies.
Grants a haste effect without affecting food and water consumption rates.
May contain up to six different enchants instead of one.
Automatically identifies wands, potions, scrolls and tomes when they are picked up.
Completely ignores food and water consumption.
Heals you for 30% of the physical weapon damage you cause.
Converts all weapon damage you receive into physical damage and reduces it by 20%.
Increases physical damage by 30% with melee and ranged weapons.
Quarters experience gained. This effect does not stack.
Hides you in plain sight and blinds the possible attacker when you take damage.
Each point of energy counts as 5 points of health. This effect does not stack.
Increases all resistances by up to 8, the lower your health.
It's such a shame that an entire race had to die for this rune to exist.
This rune gives legendary status to a weapon making it unbreakable and allows you to name the weapon.
In addition to being an excellent form of kindling, scrolls can prove out to be very useful in certain situations.

Polymorphs the target creature into a giant rat.
Charges a wand in the caster's inventory.

str.id: Empty your backpack and reset dungeon with 0 gold.
str.value: Empty your backpack and reset dungeon with 0 gold.
Why hello there. I'm the annoying user interface dog and my super accurate canine senses tell me that this is the
str.local: 为什么要说你好？我是只讨人嫌的界面狗，我 敏锐的直觉告诉我这是你第一次玩这个游戏……

str.value: first time you're playing this game...
Please pay attention now. I'll be telling this only once and failure to comprehend will lead you to ask silly questions
str.local: 请注意听讲。我只说一次，如果你不仔细听以 后肯定会跑到网上问各种傻问题……

str.value: Allrighty then. You can move onto any of the eight adjacent tiles by using the keypad or by clicking in the desired
str.local: 让我们开始吧。你可以按小键盘数字键向邻近 的八个地块移动，鼠标点击想去的方向也可以 ……

str.value: Now that looks like a nasty creature. If you want, you can attack it by moving towards it...
str.local: 现在那里有个讨厌的生物。如果你想攻击它只 需要向它移动……

str.value: You can use adjacent map objects or items by holding down the Ctrl-key and pressing the relevant movement key
str.local: 想使用旁边的地图物品，可以按住 Ctrl 键再 按对应的方向，或是用鼠标右键点击对应的方 向也可以……

str.value: or by right-clicking in the desired direction...
You can view the loot under your feet by holding down the Loot-key (Default: Alt) or by clicking the right side of the
str.local: 按住拾取键（默认：Alt）可以浏览你脚下的拾 取品，或是用鼠标点击屏幕右侧……

str.value: Whenever you're fatigued or wounded, you can rest and gain energy or health with the Rest-button (Default: Keypad5)
str.local: 一旦你开始疲惫或受伤，你可以通过按下休息 按钮（默认：小键盘 5）休息来获得精力和生 命点，鼠标点自己也可以……

str.value: Note, however, that in order to gain health, you must have both hunger and thirst satiated (see the bottom right
str.local: 注意：要获得生命值，必须不在饥饿和口渴的 状态下（看一下右下角）……

str.value: You can equip and use items in the inventory after bringing it up with the Equip-button (Default: E) or by clicking on
str.local: 你可以在物品界面使用和装备物品，按装备按 钮（默认：E）可以弹出。用鼠标点击屏幕右侧 也可以……

str.value: the right side of the screen...
While the inventory is shown, you can equip and use items with the Enter-key. If you also hold down the Shift-key
str.local: 在物品界面显示时，你可以通过 Enter 键装备 或使用物品。你还可以按下 Shift 键把物品装 备在副手栏位……

str.value: you can equip an item in the offhand...
Alternatively, you can click an item to use or equip it or you can drag and drop the item in the chosen slot (or out of
str.local: 第二种选择是，你可以鼠标点击物品来装备或 使用它，也可以拖拽物品到指定槽位（或拖出 物品界面）……

str.value: You can drop items from the inventory after bringing it up with the Drop-button (Default: D) or you can drag and
str.local: 你可以按下丢弃按钮（默认：D）弹出物品界面 ，然后丢弃物品。用鼠标拖拽也可以……

str.value: You can throw items from the inventory after bringing it up with the Throw-button (Default: F) or you can right-click
str.local: 你可以按下投掷按钮（默认：F）弹出物品界面 ，然后投掷物品。用鼠标右键也可以投掷……

str.value: Excellent! I see you have found yourself a ranged weapon. You can make ranged attacks with the Attack-button
str.local: 太棒了！我发现你自己找到了一件远程武器。 你可以通过攻击按钮（默认：A）进行远程攻击 ……

str.value: Your weapon needs to be rearmed before it can be used again. This is done automatically if you rest while having
str.local: 你的武器需要进行整备才能再次使用。这个过 程在你装备有该武器时通过休息可以自动完成 ……

str.value: You can use stairs and ladders by pressing the Enter-key...
str.local: 按一下 Enter 键可以使用楼梯或梯子……

str.value: Oh look, you have earned your first talent point. You can spend it by visiting a trainer or by using one of the trainer
str.local: 看，你获得了第一个天赋点。你可以通过拜访 导师或使用训练地块来用掉它……

str.value: Note, however, that you can learn a maximum of six talents and there's no money back guarantee, so choose them
str.local: 注意：你最多只能学习六项天赋，没有退款服 务。所以，想好了再选……

str.value: Great choice! You can use the talent you just learned through the spellbook by pressing the Cast-button (Default: C)...
str.local: 明智的选择！你可以通过按下施法按钮（默认 ：C）打开法术书使用你刚学到的天赋……

str.value: Way to go you little Wizard! You can cast the spell you just learned through the spellbook by pressing the Cast-button
str.local: 小法师出击！你可以通过按下施法按钮（默认 ：C）打开法术书施展你刚学的法术……

str.value: You can bind and unbind spells and active talents on hotkeys by selecting one and pressing a Hotkey-button
str.local: 你可以将主动天赋和法术绑定到热键或解绑， 只需选择它然后按下热键（默认：1,2,3,4,5, 6,7 ）……

str.value: Oh look, you have gained a friend. You can order friends to follow you, move to a location or attack a target with the
str.local: 看，你获得了一个朋友。你可以命令朋友跟随 你、移动到一个位置、或攻击一个目标，按下 聚焦键即可（默认：X）……

str.value: Great job, you've cleared the dungeon. Now you can quickly travel back to town with the Travel-button (Default: T)...
str.local: 干得漂亮，你清空了地牢。现在你可以按下旅 行（默认：T）快速回到城镇……

str.value: Ouch, that's gotta hurt. I don't want to rub it in but you could've found the trap with the Search-button (Default: S)...
str.local: 哎哟，好疼。我不想重复唠叨，其实你可以通 过按下搜索按钮（默认：Ｓ）来提前发现陷阱 的……

str.value: So that's where I dug the hole. You can try to jump over it with the Jump-button (Default: Q)...
str.local: 这里是我挖的一个洞。你可以试一下按跳跃按 钮（默认：Q）越过它……

str.value: If you can't seem to figure out what something is you can take a look at it with the Look-button (Default: V)...
str.local: 如果你不确定那个东西是什么，你可以按下观 察按钮（默认：V）看一眼……

str.value: Look at all that junk... I mean valuables! If you need some quick space you can arrange your inventory with the
str.local: 看看这些垃圾…… 我的意思是这些宝贝！如果你 需要腾点空间出来，你可以按下排序按钮（默 认：R）整理一下……

str.value: Yikes, you might actually have what it takes to beat this game. You can check your heritage rewards by pressing F3...
str.local: 呀！你可能获得了通关这个游戏的关键。按一 下 F3 查看一下你的遗产奖励……

str.id: Press and hold %s to view all tutorial entries.
str.value: Press and hold %s to view all tutorial entries.
str.local: 按住 %s 浏览所有的教学项。

str.id: This heritage can't be unlocked on casual difficulty level.
str.value: This heritage can't be unlocked on casual difficulty level.

str.id: This heritage is not available on heroic difficulty level.
str.value: This heritage is not available on heroic difficulty level.
Equips the rogue with a staff at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents:
Equips the rogue with a bow and arrows at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents:
Equips the rogue with 3 throwing knives at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents:
Equips the rogue with a sword and buckler at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents:
Equips the rogue with a leather armour set at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing any monster.
Note that monsters are visibly larger than your average creature.
Equips the rogue with a potion of antidote at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level %d.
Equips the rogue with a potion of healing at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level %d.
Teaches Literacy: Common as the seventh talent at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the secret seventh talent.
Places a blessing on the main hand weapon at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by viewing all tutorial entries.
Places a random enchant on the main hand weapon at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by having 11 enchanted items equipped at the same time (shirt or robe don't count).
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 20 while eating only blood cap mushrooms.
Grants ability to use the following talents while unarmed:%s
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 20 while causing physical damage with fists only.
Improves Trap Master talent so that it also works with magic traps.
This heritage can be unlocked by finding three or more hidden magic traps with the search button in a single game.
Grants a +1 modifier to all reflex checks.
This heritage can be unlocked by passing three or more reflex checks in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by visiting the graves of all Heroes of Hallwood:
This heritage can be unlocked by having %d or more points of fire resistance at any given time.
This heritage can be unlocked by having %d or more points of frost resistance at any given time.
This heritage can be unlocked by having %d or more points of shock resistance at any given time.
This heritage can be unlocked by having %d or more points of poison resistance at any given time.
This heritage can be unlocked by having %d or more points of disease resistance at any given time.
Grants ability to use wands without learning how to read.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning six talents without learning how to read.
Grants knowledge of one random Celestial spell at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Celestial spells in a single game.
Grants knowledge of one random Draconic spell at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Draconic spells in a single game.
Grants knowledge of one random Infernal spell at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Infernal spells in a single game.
Allows you to learn Arcane spells with Literacy: Common while using any amulet.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Arcane spells in a single game.
Allows you to learn Bestial spells with Literacy: Common and without levitation.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Bestial spells in a single game.
Allows you to learn Abyssal spells with Literacy: Common and without sacrifice.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Abyssal spells in a single game.
Grants knowledge of all amulet effects at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all amulet effects in a single game.
Grants knowledge of all ring effects at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all ring effects in a single game.
Grants knowledge of all wand effects at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all wand effects in a single game.
Grants knowledge of all scroll effects at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all scroll effects in a single game.
Grants knowledge of all potion effects at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all potion effects in a single game.
Grants knowledge of all enchant effects at the start of the game and gives you a 20% discount at the Wizards' Guild.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all enchant effects in a single game.
Allows you to enchant your black shirt or robe.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a black shirt or robe and defiling graves until you see something purple.
Allows you to enchant your red shirt or robe.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a red shirt or robe and eating some meat.
Allows you to enchant your green shirt or robe.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a green shirt or robe and destroying an item by throwing it to a wall.
Allows you to enchant your blue shirt or robe.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a blue shirt or robe and dropping an item while stuck in a water pit.
Allows you to enchant your orange shirt or robe.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing an orange shirt or robe and wielding two swords at the same time.
Allows you to enchant your yellow shirt or robe.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a yellow shirt or robe and flipping a coin until you get three tails in a row.
Allows you to enchant your pink shirt or robe.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a pink shirt or robe and saying '%s' without the quotes on the chat.
Allows you to enchant your white shirt or robe.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a white shirt or robe and using a soul gem until you receive your multipass.
Your shirt or robe is now blessed and it may contain two enchants.
This heritage can be unlocked by obtaining a score of over 9000 after unlocking all 8 shirt heritages above.
Gives you absolutely nothing since you obviously don't need any help.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing Gurmur and interrupting the cultists' plan to take over the world.
Gives you a dog named Woof at the start of the game.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing a Dread Wolf.
Allows you to see Woof's health bar.
This heritage can be unlocked by taking a look at Woof while it is badly hurt or almost dead.
This heritage can be unlocked by rescuing Woof from a pit.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 3.
Upgrades Woof's Hardened Skin to +2 physical resistance and +1 chromatic resistance at level 3.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 6.
Upgrades Woof's Hardened Skin to +3 physical resistance and +2 chromatic resistance at level 6.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 9.
Upgrades Woof's Vicious Bite to Ferocius Bite at level 9.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 12.
Grants Woof +D3 physical damage at level 12.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 15.
Grants Woof +1 agility and +1 stamina at the start of the game and Heroic Charge at level 3.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof kill a Dire Wolf.
Grants Woof +1 agility and +1 stamina at the start of the game and Strong Will at level 6.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof kill a monster.
Allows the player to craft items in the Artisans' Guild (and enables crafting items in the loot tables).
This heritage can be unlocked by rescuing Artificer Leo Noerde and bringing him back to town.

str.id: Artisans' Guild now crafts blessed versions of the following items:%s
str.value: Artisans' Guild now crafts blessed versions of the following items:%s
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting all of the items marked with an asterisk in a single game.
Crafted items are now enchanted and the enchant is guaranteed to be appropriate for the item as well as the player.
This heritage can be unlocked by donating four or more unique items to the Artisans' Guild in a single game.
Allows you to use spirit totems without killing bears for spiritual attunement.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents:%s
Improves bestial wrath talent so that it also casts renewing touch on you when you shapeshift.
This heritage can be unlocked by regaining over %d points of health while shapeshifted and in combat.
Improves bestial wrath talent so that it also heals all your beast friends while shapeshifted.
This heritage can be unlocked by shapeshifting while having %d or more beast friends.
Increases strength by 1 in bear form.
This heritage can be unlocked by having a strength modifier of +5 or more when you shapeshift into a bear.
Adds an instant kill effect to your attacks in bear form.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing a full health human with a single hit in bear form at level 20.
Casts renewing touch on you when you critically hit in bear form.
This heritage can be unlocked by critically hitting any of the named encounter bosses in bear form.
Increases agility by 1 in wolf form.
This heritage can be unlocked by having an agility modifier of +5 or more when you shapeshift into a wolf.
Adds a leech effect to your attacks in wolf form.
This heritage can be unlocked by eating a dread bat that has leeched life from you while you are in wolf form.
Casts renewing touch on you when you critically hit in wolf form.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing a full health human with a critical hit in wolf form at level 20.
Increases health and energy while shapeshifted.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing %d monsters and eating their corpses while shapeshifted.
Note that shapeshifting resets the counter and this must be completed in one shift.
Allows you to learn spells from Arcane tomes while having a matching amulet equipped (*).
Once you have learned an Arcane spell you can cast it while having any amulet equipped.
This heritage can be unlocked by donating an item from the future to the Artisan's Guild.
(*) Note that you will also need to know Literacy: Common and one of the other literacies.
Allows you to learn spells from Bestial tomes with a Fairy Jizzed Bull Horn while levitating (*).
Once you have learned a Bestial spell you can cast it while having a horn in your backpack.
This heritage can be unlocked by attempting to donate an unidentified horn to the Artisan's Guild.
(*) Note that you will also need to know Literacy: Common and one of the other literacies.
Allows you to learn spells from Abyssal tomes with an Engraved Pyramidion and a sacrifice (*).
Once you have learned an Abyssal spell you can cast it while having a pyramidion in your backpack.
This heritage can be unlocked by attempting to donate an unidentified pyramidion to the Artisan's Guild.
(*) Note that you will also need to know Literacy: Common and one of the other literacies.

str.id: This challenge can't be unlocked on casual difficulty level.
str.value: This challenge can't be unlocked on casual difficulty level.

str.id: The description of this challenge is hidden until it is completed.
str.value: The description of this challenge is hidden until it is completed.
It also requires draining the swamp so you might want to start there.
This challenge can be completed by killing an enemy with a healing potion.
This challenge can be completed by causing 25 or more damage to an enemy with a single shot.
Instant kill effects do not count.
This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured level 10+ enemy with a single hit from a thrown weapon.
Instant kill effects do not count.
This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured monster while causing damage only with your bare hands.
This challenge can be completed by killing all Heroes of Hallwood in the final battle.
This challenge can be completed by clearing a dungeon consisting of three or more levels with cursed jewelry.
You must have a cursed amulet and two cursed rings equipped at the time the dungeon is reset.
Closing an entrance does not count.
This challenge can be completed by reaching level 20 without lighting any torches.
This challenge can be completed by killing yourself using telekinesis.
This challenge can be completed by completing all other challenges.
This challenge can be completed by enslaving a daemon while having a human, undead, beast and monster friends
This challenge can be completed by finishing the following encounters in a single game:
This challenge can be completed by having %d or more ability points without buffs or debuffs.
Note that this challenge is triggered at the end of a turn and it cannot be completed while in town.
This challenge can be completed by reaching level %d without killing anyone or anything.
This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after casting Divine Shield while having only one health
This challenge can be completed by having six unused talent points.
This challenge can be completed by having %d gold coins in your backpack.
This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured monster with a single blow.
Instant kill effects do not count.
This challenge can be completed by looting the crown after dying at least once.
This challenge can be completed by failing a reflex check while having Lightning Reflexes heritage and Sixth Sense
This challenge can be completed by having 20 ability damage effects that reduce all abilities by 5.
This challenge can be completed by killing a creature that has hit you for %d or more points of damage with a single
This challenge can be completed by learning all Celestial, Draconic and Infernal spells in a single game.
Enables the cloak style and color selection during character creation.
This challenge can be completed by showing your inner rogue and killing your puppy eyed soul mate.
Unlocks the option to select left and right cloak styles at the start of the game.
This challenge can be completed by starting the final battle with %d or more undead friends.
Unlocks the option to select red cloak color at the start of the game.
This challenge can be completed by killing five or more enemies with a single melee attack.
Unlocks the option to select green cloak color at the start of the game.
This challenge can be completed by equipping a weapon that has ten or more poison effects.
Unlocks the option to select blue cloak color at the start of the game.
This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured drake with frozen orbs.
Instant kill effects do not count.
Unlocks the option to select purple cloak color at the start of the game.
This challenge can be completed by obtaining the ring of power.
Unlocks the option to select black cloak color at the start of the game.
This challenge can be completed by having ten or more curse effects at the same time.
Unlocks the option to select white cloak color at the start of the game.
This challenge can be completed by having twelve or more buff effects at the same time.
This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after spending %d or more turns in lava.
This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after being surrounded by %d dwellers and/or lurkers.
Note that being levitated while surrounded prevents that part of this challenge from triggering (so don't levitate).
This challenge can be completed by killing %d enemies in a row without being hit by a melee, ranged or spell attack.
Note that snails and charmed creatures do not count.
This challenge can be completed by regaining %d points of health by life draining enemies.
Note that any other form of healing resets the counter.
This challenge can be completed by doing the following:
This challenge can be completed by by eating the following monsters while polymorphed:
This challenge can be completed by killing %d under aged daemons at level 20 after typing:
This challenge can be completed by finding and resurrecting Ken'nih before his corpse is eaten by rats.
Note that this can be attempted only once per game and you must be polymorphed in order to complete it.
This challenge can be completed by having Woof cause any damage to the King.
This challenge can be completed by looting the crown on heroic difficulty level.
This challenge can be completed by killing Dreadlord Nabon and ending his reign of terror.
Unlocks "%s" title and adds runes to loot tables.
This challenge can be completed by making sure that dwarves won't be added in the game anytime soon.
This challenge can be completed by befriending an infernal.
This challenge can be completed by having three permanent drake friends at the same time.
This challenge can be completed by causing at least %d points of enchanted elemental damage before resistances
with a single melee or ranged hit.
This challenge can be completed by viewing your stats while having %d immunities (press Ctrl in the inventory).
This challenge can be completed by completing the following steps:%s
This challenge can be completed by having a treeman heal four or more other treemen in one turn.
Note that it's easier to spawn a treeman when you increase your critical hit modifier.
This challenge can be completed by killing a merchant and all his henchmen with giant rats.
Note that the challenge fails if any of the targets is killed by something other than a giant rat.
This challenge can be completed by slaying a demonrat that is properly triggered.
Note that triggered demonrats have a hateful aura that reflects damage.
Unlocks "%s" title and enables legendary effects.
This challenge can be completed by naming a weapon "Orangutang" and using it to slay %d swamp monsters.
Note that it should be wielded in the main hand while killing lurkers and or dwellers.
This legendary effect can be imbued by taming a cave bear.
This legendary effect can be imbued by casting Divine Shield while below 25% health and adjacent to an enemy.
This legendary effect can be imbued by reading a master's scroll of light.
This legendary effect can be imbued by killing a demonrat.
This legendary effect can be imbued by jumping over a lava chasm.
This legendary effect can be imbued by turning invisible when you cast Plane Shift.
This legendary effect can be imbued by applying a potent deadly poison on the weapon.
This legendary effect can be imbued by killing an enemy with splash damage of an enlarged orb.
This legendary effect can be imbued by killing Woof.
This challenge can be completed by being known as '%s' after finishing the test of leadership.
The test of leadership has three questions and three possible types of answers (cruel, fair and gentle).
If you answer the test with one of each types of answers, you will be known as '%s'.
If you answer the test with cruel and fair answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
If you answer the test with cruel and gentle answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
If you answer the test with fair and gentle answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
If you answer the test with cruel answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
If you answer the test with fair answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
If you answer the test with gentle answers only, you will be known as '%s'.

You see a STR_MAN that seems self-righteous.
You see a STR_MAN who seems holier than thou.
You see a STR_MAN who seems somewhat rugged.
Who did you say you are?
I didn't, but I'm STR_NAME, and you are?
So, what is it that you do?
I'm here to protect my master, STR_MASTER.
Straight to business eh? Well, I'm a merchant.
I'm a merchant and I trade and identify items here.
That time of the month eh?
Keep going and I'll show you what time it is.
Die, die, die, seriously, just die!
Not before you roll over and die!
It's time for you to die now.
Tell me more about your master.
I can't do that, now go away.
If you want to live, you better help me now...
I can see the way you look at me. What if...
STR_NAME seems happy to be alive.
Your soul mate looks at you with puppy eyes.
I'm sorry but it's because of me, not you.
You can almost feel how the puppy eyes shatter.
Can you teach me any new tricks?
Do you know any fancy moves?
Perhaps, if you are ready to learn...
Ready to learn some new tricks?
Ready to learn some fancy moves?
Do you know any cool spells?
Do you know any other spells?
Yes, but only one well enough to teach.
Can you teach me those other spells?
Hrmph, you're back. Are you ready now?
I've already told you enough, now go away.
Are you sure that is what you want?
Let me think about this again.
Try not to think too hard.
So, the first thing you need to know is that...
So, all you have to do is say these words...
After carefully examining your answers, the powers that be have come to a conclusion.
You are hereby known as %s %s the %s.
Why hello there. I'm Death and I've been expecting you.
By the way, you're going straight to hell because you overstayed your visit in life.
What took you so long? I almost got worried that maybe you weren't coming after all.
I almost had to call in favors to get you here but I'm glad you managed to come on your own.
You could've come earlier but don't worry, there's plenty of heat here to keep your soup hot.
Thank you for not wasting my time any more than you did. Now move along and enjoy your stay.
Thank you for coming to me so soon. Now let me reward you with everlasting agony.
- You did say rich with filth, right?
- I see you're into twins. Let's make that two...
- You get a feeling that you have just been fooled.

Strength modifier applies to melee to-hit rolls, melee damage rolls, thrown weapon damage rolls, block modifier,
str.local: 力量修正影响近战命中骰，近战伤害骰，投掷武器 伤害骰，格挡骰，破门检定，攀爬检定，陷阱检定 ，缴械检定，恐吓检定。

str.value: break checks, climb checks, snare checks, disarm checks and intimidation checks.
Agility modifier applies to ranged to-hit rolls, ranged damage rolls, thrown weapon to-hit rolls, melee to-hit and
str.local: 敏捷修正影响远程命中骰，远程伤害骰，投掷武器 命中骰，小型武器及（双手使用的）中型武器的命 中和伤害骰，闪避修正，招架修正，陷阱拆除检定 ，开锁检定，潜行检定，跳跃检定。

str.value: damage rolls with small and medium weapons (when used two-handedly), dodge modifier, parry modifier, disarm
trap checks, pick lock checks, sneak checks and jump checks.
Stamina modifier applies to spell to-hit rolls with destructive and or offensive spells, mental checks, search checks,
str.local: 耐力修正影响毁灭性法术和攻击性法术的命中骰， 精神检定、搜索检定，生命点数，精力点数，以及 生命点和精力点的恢复检定。

str.value: health points, energy points, as well as health and energy regeneration checks.
Charisma modifier applies to spell to-hit rolls with restorative and or defensive spells, persuasion checks and
str.local: 魅力修正影响恢复性法术和防御性法术的命中骰， 说服检定，商品价格。魅力还有机会开启和 NPC 的 特殊交互菜单。

str.value: merchant prices. Charisma may also open special conversation options with NPC's.

str.value: These are the six resistances from left to right: Physical, Fire, Frost, Shock, Poison and Disease.
str.local: 从左至右共有六项抗性：物理、火焰、冰霜、震击 、毒害、疾病。

str.value: The left and right values indicate resistance against critical hits (head) and normal hits (body).
str.local: 左右两项值分别表示针对暴击（头部）和普通攻击 （身体）的抗性。

str.value: Besides having different hit location, critical hits can also confuse, disarm or cause bleeding.
str.local: 除了攻击部位不同，暴击还会引起混乱、缴械、导 致流血。

str.value: Note that you can halve the duration of the confusion effect by using a closed helmet.
str.local: 注意：带上一个封闭型头盔可以让混乱效果的持续 时间减半。

It increases agility and charisma by 1 and physical, poison and disease resistances by 1.
It increases strength and stamina by 1 and fire, frost and shock resistances by 1.
It allows you to cast spells at any target within line of sight.
It normally absorbs up to 30 points of damage before wearing off.
It heals you for D3 + CHA points per turn.
It amplifies the damage of orb spells by D6.
It causes the next orb spell to explode upon impact causing an additional D6 + STA points of damage and the
spell's normal damage on any adjacent creatures.
It increases light radius and search radius by 1.
It increases all resistances by a number equal to STA / 2, or 1, whichever is higher. This effect is automatically
dispelled if your equipped items change for whatever reason.
You should never be able to see this text unless you become an illusion.
It captures your soul in a gem upon death.
It makes your face resemble that of a Kling'On and any creature attempting to attack you must pass a mental check
or be afraid for D6 turns.
You should never be able to see this text unless you become a daemon.
It has a chance of causing D3 points of magic damage.
It has a chance of causing you to become envious for D6 turns. While envious, you are forced to move towards and
attack the nearest creature of the same gender or miss your turn if no such creature exists.
It has a chance of causing you to spend a turn eating or drinking. If you don't have anything suitable to consume,
you will be frenzied for D6 turns.
It has a chance of causing you to become greedy for D6 turns. While greedy, you are forced to move towards the
nearest item and attempt to pick it up or miss your turn if no such item exists.
It has a chance of causing you to lose one level on the seven level hunger track (counts as up to 360 turns of food
It has a chance of causing you to become lustful for D6 turns. While lustful, you are forced to move towards the
nearest creature of the opposite gender and beat that creature into submission or miss your turn if no such
It has a chance of causing you to become reckless for D6 turns. While reckless, you are forced to move towards and
attack the nearest enemy creature or miss your turn if no such creature exists.
It has a chance of causing you to lose one point of energy and miss your next turn. This effect also forces you to
It has a chance of causing you to lose one level on the seven level thirst track (counts as up to 360 turns of water
It has a chance of causing you to become frenzied for D6 turns. While frenzied, you are forced to move towards and
attack the nearest creature or miss your turn if no such creature exists.
It has a chance of blinding you for D6 turns. While blinded, you may act normally with the exception that you can't
see anything. This also applies a negative modifier to hit rolls that equals to the power level of the poison.
It has a chance of charming you for D6 turns. While charmed, you are forced to attack the nearest creature that is
also an enemy of the charmer or miss your turn if no such creature exists. This also forces you to pass a mental
It has a chance of confusing you for D6 turns. While confused, your moves and attacks are made in a random
direction. This also applies a negative modifier to hit rolls that equals to the power level of the poison.
It has a chance of causing D3 points of poison damage. This also forces you to re-roll successful health regeneration
It has a chance of deafening you for D6 turns. This also applies a negative modifier on casting rolls that equals to the
power level of the poison. Creatures with %s talent are not affected.
It has a chance of causing you to lose 1 point of energy. This also applies a negative modifier on energy
regeneration rolls that equals to the power level of the poison. The damage caused by this poison also counts as
an energy drain effect for immunity purposes.
It has a chance of causing you to lose D3 points of health. This also applies a negative modifier on health
regeneration rolls that equals to the power level of the poison. The damage caused by this poison also counts as
a health drain effect for immunity purposes.
It has a chance of paralysing you for D6 turns. This also counts as a slow effect.
It has a chance of silencing you for D6 turns. While silenced, you may not cast spells, read scrolls or talk to other
creatures. This also applies a negative modifier on casting rolls that equals to the power level of the poison.
Creatures with %s talent are not affected.
It has a chance of causing you to fall asleep for D6 turns. Any damage will interrupt the current sleep effect but the
poison remains and you may fall asleep again on the next turn.
It counts as a slow effect and as an effect that may cause you to miss your next turn. This also reduces dodge, parry
and block modifiers with a number that equals to the power level of the poison.
It has a chance of causing one point of strength damage and a chance to place a slow effect on you for D6 turns.
It has a chance of causing one point of stamina damage and a chance to cause D3 points of health damage.
It has a chance of causing one point of strength damage and a chance to place a paralysis effect on you for D6 turns.
It has a chance of causing one point of stamina damage and a chance to cause D3 points of energy damage.
It has a chance of triggering the effects of any other disease.
It has a chance of causing one point of agility damage and a chance to place a blind effect on you for D6 turns.
It has a chance of causing one point of charisma damage and a chance to place a silence effect on you for D6 turns.
It has a chance of causing one point of agility damage and a chance to place a confusion effect on you for D6 turns.
It has a chance of causing one point of charisma damage and a chance to place a sleep effect on you for D6 turns.
You are afraid and you are forced to run away from the source of this effect.
You are asleep and that causes you to miss your turn.
You are blinded and that allows you to bump into walls without kicking them, which is just amazing.
You are charmed and you are forced to attack the nearest creature that is also an enemy of the charmer or miss
your turn if no such creature exists.
You are chilled and that may cause you to miss your turn.
You are confused and that allows you to play this game as if you were drunk while sober.
You are deafened and that prevents you from enjoying the awesome sounds of this game.
You are energised and that allows you to re-roll failed energy regeneration checks.
You are envious and you are forced to move towards and attack the nearest creature of the same gender or miss

You are levitated and that allows you to float over traps without getting stuck.
You are lustful and you are forced to move towards the nearest creature of the opposite gender and beat that

You are shocked and that causes you to miss your turn.
You are silenced and that prevents you from casting spells and reading scrolls.
You are slowed and that may cause you to miss your turn.
You are stunned and that causes you to miss your turn.
You are vitalised and that allows you to re-roll failed health regeneration checks.
You have gained the ability to regenerate but you are also vulnerable to fire.

str.id: You have temporarily gained knowledge of the %s talent.
str.value: You have temporarily gained knowledge of the %s talent.
You are bleeding and take D3 points of bleed damage per turn.

str.id: You have 1 bolt or arrow equipped.
str.value: You have 1 bolt or arrow equipped.

str.id: You have %d bolts or arrows equipped.
str.value: You have %d bolts or arrows equipped.

str.id: Your weapon must be reloaded by resting before it can be used again.
str.value: Your weapon must be reloaded by resting before it can be used again.

str.id: Your main hand weapon is poisoned.
str.value: Your main hand weapon is poisoned.
The spell contained in your amulet is on cooldown. Recharge it by having it equipped for as many turns as it says.
You can learn a talent now. Find a trainer or use one of the trainer tiles (altar, dummy, fireplace, target, well or totem).
As you place the crown on your head, whispers start hearing in the hallways growing stronger with every breath you take:
You have defeated %s in a fair challenge and you are now the rightful ruler of Frostmourn.
According to the ancient laws, it is now your right to have your way with the servants in any way that pleases you.
Should you become bored or there's animosity amongst your people, you can always throw a few peasants down from the walls.
Be as it may, you are now ready for the test of leadership...
%s managed to hoard a total of %d gold coins during those %d turns %s quest lasted.
%s %s managed to hoard a total of %d gold coins during those %d turns %s journey lasted.

- 开始就拥有职业关联装备。
- 开始就拥有职业关联天赋。

str.id: - Traps and snares do less damage.
str.value: - Traps and snares do less damage.

str.local: - 物品不经鉴定即可售卖。
- 成为国王后无法被记录。

str.value: Warriors rely on brute force and melee weapons to deal with their enemies.
str.local: 武士善用蛮力和近战武器对付敌人 。

str.value: They quickly approach their enemies and finish them off with a series of crushing blows.
str.local: 他们迅速地接近敌人，用一套粉碎 打击干掉对手。

str.value: Archers rely on perception and ranged weapons to deal with their enemies.
str.local: 射手极具洞察力，善用远程武器干 掉敌人。

str.value: They maintain optimal range to their enemies and snipe them down with a few well aimed shots.
str.local: 他们尽量和敌人拉开距离，通过几 发精准的射击干掉对手。

str.value: Assassins rely on stealth and initiative to deal with their enemies.
str.local: 刺客擅长隐秘行动，对敌人主动发 起攻击。

str.value: They silently move in for the first strike and quickly finish any survivors with a blade flurry.
str.local: 他们潜行抢先发起攻击，用剑刃乱 舞快速地解决一息尚存的敌人。

str.value: Paladins rely on Celestial magic to buff them and keep them alive as they rid the world of evil.
str.local: 天使系法术让圣骑士活下来驱散世 界中的邪恶。

str.value: Wizards rely on Draconic magic to aid them in their innate quest to seek more knowledge and power.
str.local: 法师依靠龙系法术来追寻更多知识 和力量来完成他们的使命。

str.value: Warlocks rely on Infernal magic to help them accomplish their nefarious deeds and ambitions.
str.local: 术士依靠地狱系法术来完成他们邪 恶的野心。

str.id: - Start with a shirt and dagger.
str.value: - Start with a shirt and dagger.
str.local: - 开始只装备有衬衫和匕首。
